title: Cre4tures - Brone: Creature Sounds and Phrases
description: A collection of 202 audio files of words, phrases, and utterances from the dark and twisted Cre4ture "Brone"
longDescription:
Audio Preview: SOUNDCLOUD


Brone is the 6th creature release in 4 Chamber Sound's "Cre4ture" Series and is also found in part of the bundle "Cre4ture Series: Volume 1"


Brone is a tall, thin brute with unparalleled strength especially for his deceptive human-like complexion. His deep, strong voice is commanding, fearsome and at times overbearing: your first instinct is to curl up in the corner and get away from the oppression. To make matters worse, Brone is psychopathic and will do anything in his power to dominate his opponent or anyone that gets in his way.


Audio files in this package range from simple, common responses and a variety of numbers, to grunts, growls and other emotion-filled babbling. See below for full list of all phrases. Don't see a phrase that you need? Reach out to Matt at 4chambersound@gmail.com for custom audio
